basics.name: Daniel-André Dücker
basics.label: Dr.-Ing., Senior Scientist & Group Lead Environmental Robotics
basics.summary: Senior Scientist at the Munich Institute of Robotics and Machine Intelligence (MIRMI), TU Munich. Group Leader for Environmental Robotics and Chief of Engineering in Senior Management. My research focuses on probabilistic robotics, underwater systems, and multi-robot field experiments, combining fundamental methods with real-world deployment.
